name: Komrad (itch)
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In this two-player cooperative game, you need to defuse a bomb within ten minutes. Use a unique device to guide your partner in controlling the Komrad robot. The success of your partnership can save the world from destruction!

Platform : PC + Custom Controller
Engine : Unity 3D
Number of players : 2
Genre : Puzzle/Platformer

Producer : Marion Chabrol-Supt
Game Art : Umi Guillou, Céline Lascaux, Eliette Scherer
Game Programming : Yazid El Mekki, Cyril Menard, Stéphane Pontadit
Music & Sound Design : Corentin Langou
